(b)when the construction works will resume.

(d)Chipelembe. QUESTIONS FOR WRITTEN ANSWER W47    Mr S Chungu (Luanshya) - to ask the Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education which colleges of education both in the private and public sectors offer the following programmes:
(a)certificate; and
(b)diploma. W48    Mr S Chungu (Luanshya) - to ask the Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development:
(a)which mining companies in Zambia produce gold;
(b)where the mines are located;
(c)how many tonnes of gold were mined from January, 2010 to March, 2013; and
(d)how much money was raised from the sale of the gold, company by company in the same period. W49    Mr Matafwali (Bangweulu) - to ask the Minister of Home Affairs:
(a)how many churches were registered in Zambia as of January, 2013;
(b)how many organisations under the following categories were deregistered from January, 2007 to January, 2013:
(i)churches; (ii)political parties; and (iii)civil society organisations; and
(c)what the reasons for the de-registration were.
